msg: OAK-893: MongoMK may fail with MicroKernelException under concurrent commits

author: brane
msg: (Array::Array): When constructing an array proxy from an APR array,
double-check that the element size and value type match.
(Hash<void,void>::iterate): Move declaration to the top of the class.

author: ffang
msg: [KARAF-2378]Shell:exec doesn't show output for commands that execute too quickly

author: stevehay
msg: Don't use AP_DECLARE when declaring/defining our own versions of functions no longer in httpd

The AP_DECLARE macro marks symbols as "dllexport" when compiled in httpd or as "dllimport" when compiled in third-party code such as mod_perl, but defining a function marked "dllimport" isn't allowed.

author: rmannibucau
msg: TOMEE-1000 openejb-hessian module - using reflection to potentially let hessian be provided in the app
